title: Jalen’s Big Whiff
description:
Jalen made some headlines over the weekend at the PGA Tour Champions' Ally Challenge, but not for good reasons. Five swings and misses for Jalen and his swing is officially broken. Was the club too small? Was it not enough advice from Jack Nicklaus? Was the grass too green? Jacoby tries to get to the bottom of Jalen’s bad day. Also, Brady is number #1 according to his peers, but is he too old? Brady will be the first to tell you he is especially after taking 10 days off. Listen to find out why Jalen thinks why Brady really needed the time off. Plus, Giannis goes off on Belgium. Find out what it means for the superstar going into this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
